  • Uses of Task in com.github.timmy80.mia.core

    Classes in com.github.timmy80.mia.core with type parameters of type Task
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Terminal<T extends Task>
    A non Thread Executor which depends on a Task to be executed.
    Creating terminals allows to dispatch the management of complex sub-tasks in a logical context.
    Terminal provides a state mechanism which allows to further dispatch the complexity.

    A Terminal has always a State unless terminated.
    Subclasses of Task in com.github.timmy80.mia.core
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ProbesTask
    A task that manages the probes configured on its ApplicationContext
